myControllers

Class DBController

  • java.lang.Object
    • myControllers.DBController

  • public class DBController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a controller which interact with the database csv file. The operation can be gets, add, update, delete to/from database.
    Author:

                                         java.lang.String number,
                                         java.lang.String email)
        Update student's phone number or email or both in the Student database. Pass in '-' if do not want to be updated.
        Parameters:
        accountID - Student's matriculation number.
        number - Student's new mobile phone number.
        email - Student's new email.
        Returns:

      • editVacByIndex

        public static boolean editVacByIndex(java.lang.String index,
                                     char sign)
        Update number of a student and vacancy in an Index in the Index_Capacity database. Returns true if successfully updated if not return false.
        Parameters:
        index - index number of vacancy to be updated.
        sign - indicate add or remove number of a student. '-' to add a student or '+' to remove a student from index.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • validateUser

        public static User validateUser(java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String passWord)
        Validate if given username and password is the same as the one in the database. It will first try to retrieve User from the database. Then it will ask the User object to check the password entered by user is correct. Returns the User object if successfully validated else return null.
        Parameters:
        userName - User entered username.
        passWord - User entered password.
        Returns:
        User object of the given username.

      • writeAll

        public static boolean writeAll(java.lang.String filename,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> dataLineArray)
        Replace all old content in a database. Returns true if successfully written else return false.
        Parameters:
        filename - file name of the csv databse to write to.
        dataLineArray - new content to be written to the database.
        Returns:
        true or false.
